page.title: 19Leisure time on Papa Stour.
page.content: In the winter the days are very short. It gets dark at 4.00 pm.so we spend all evening indoors.Some people watch T.V. but we don't have one.My brother reads all the time but I like to play. I play with my battery-powered truck, my farm or my lego.Mum and dad Knit and listen to the radio. In the summer it never gets really dark (Simmer Dim) so I play outside a lot.When I come home from school I like to row around the bay in our fibre-glass dinghy.Somtimes I go out with my dad in his 16' Orkney built boat.We fish for mackerel,ollick and pilticks.My brother has a wet suit and likes to go snorkelling but it's too cold for me. Mummy likes to build dry stone walls and dig the garden.She grows soft fruit,flowers and vegetables.I like to pinch the peas when she's not looking!
